markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Boots of Elvenkind](/Equipment.aspx?ID=413)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These tall, pointed boots are made from soft, supple black or green leather and are decorated with trim and buckles of gold. When worn, the boots allow you to move more nimbly, granting you a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks.

<document level="2" id="action-236" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Elvenkind
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 145 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Elvenkind (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 606 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The boots grant a +2 bonus. If you’re also wearing a _cloak of elvenkind_, _greater boots of elvenkind_ constantly grant the effects of [_pass without trace_](/Spells.aspx?ID=215) (DC 30) in forest environments.
name: Boots of Elvenkind (Greater)
